NodeId.Description: Node Id: Node Id of the UAVCAN component. 0 invokes dynamic Node Id allocation.

Preferred_NodeId.Description: Preferred NodeId: If possible, this Node Id is requested during dynamic Node Id allocation.

NodeStatus_Rate.Description: NodeStatus Rate: Rate with which the NodeStatus message is emitted.

Debug.Description: Debug: Enables debug output, emits protocol.debug.LogMessage messages.

Node_Configurati.Description: Node Configuration: Bit mask which allows to select a ceratin configuration of the node. Node dependent.

OutA_Mode.Description: OutA Mode: Sets the type of output signal for channel A.

OutB_Mode.Description: OutB Mode: Sets the type of output signal for channel B.
OutB Mode: Sets the type of output signal for channel C.

OutA1_Index.Description: OutA1 Index: Index in the esc.RawCommand or actuator_id in the actuator.ArrayCommand message to which this output listens. -1: Output is disabled.

OutA2_Index.Description: OutA2 Index: Index in the esc.RawCommand or actuator_id in the actuator.ArrayCommand message to which this output listens. -1: Output is disabled.

OutB1_Index.Description: OutB1 Index: Index in the esc.RawCommand or actuator_id in the actuator.ArrayCommand message to which this output listens. -1: Output is disabled.

OutB2_Index.Description: OutB2 Index: Index in the esc.RawCommand or actuator_id in the actuator.ArrayCommand message to which this output listens. -1: Output is disabled.

OutC1_Index.Description: OutC1 Index: Index in the esc.RawCommand or actuator_id in the actuator.ArrayCommand message to which this output listens. -1: Output is disabled.

OutC2_Index.Description: OutC2 Index: Index in the esc.RawCommand or actuator_id in the actuator.ArrayCommand message to which this output listens. -1: Output is disabled.

OutA_PwmPeriod.Description: OutA PwmPeriod: PWM period, if a PWM output is selected, for channel A.

OutB_PwmPeriod.Description: OutB PwmPeriod: PWM period, if a PWM output is selected, for channel B.

OutC_PwmPeriod.Description: OutC PwmPeriod: PWM period, if a PWM output is selected, for channel C.

EscStatus_Rate.Description: EscStatus Rate: Rate with which esc.Status messages are emitted for DSHOT outputs.

Motor_Pole_Pairs.Description: Motor Pole Pairs: Number of motor pole pairs. Important for converting toi mechanical rpm in the esc.Status message.

OutA1_Direction.Description: OutA1 Direction: Sets the rotation direction for DSHOT outputs.

OutA2_Direction.Description: OutA2 Direction: Sets the rotation direction for DSHOT outputs.

OutB1_Direction.Description: OutB1 Direction: Sets the rotation direction for DSHOT outputs.

OutB2_Direction.Description: OutB2 Direction: Sets the rotation direction for DSHOT outputs.

OutC1_Direction.Description: OutC1 Direction: Sets the rotation direction for DSHOT outputs.

OutC2_Direction.Description: OutC2 Direction: Sets the rotation direction for DSHOT outputs.

Led_Oreo_Brightn.Description: Led Oreo Brightness: Sets the brightness of the OreoLEDs.

MagneticField_Ra.Description: MagneticField Rate: Rate with which ahrs.MagneticFieldStrength2 messages are emitted. 0:Disabled.

MagneticField_Id.Description: MagneticField Id: Value of sensor_id in the ahrs.MagneticFieldStrength2 messages.

Magnetic_Sensor_.Description: Magnetic Sensor Type: Selcts the type of magnetometer chip.

Uart1_ChannelId.Description: Uart1 ChannelId: Value of channel_id in the tunnel.Broadcast messages. -1:Disabled.

Gps_Rate.Description: Gps Rate: Rate with which gnss.Fix messages are emitted. 0:Disabled. NOT RECOMMENDED TO USE.

Led_Light_Bright.Description: Led Light Brightness: Brightness of the indicator led.

Led_Light_Id.Description: Led Light Id: Index into the indication.LightsCommand command array this light is listening to.

Baro_Rate.Description: Baro Rate: Rate with which air_data.StaticPressure messages are emitted. 0:Disabled.

Baro_Sensor_Type.Description: Baro Sensor Type: Selects the type of magnetometer chip. 2 is not recommended.

Led_Notify_Brigh.Description: Led Notify Brightness: Brightness of the notifier leds.

Battery_Id.Description: Battery Id: Value of battery_id in the uc4h.GenericBatteryInfo messages.

Battery_Rate.Description: Battery Rate: Rate with which uc4h.GenericBatteryInfo messages are emitted. 0:Disabled.

Battery_Message.Description: Battery Message: Selects which UAVCAN message is emitted. 1 is not recommended.

SERIALTNL0_BAUD.Description: The baud rate used on this port.

SERIALTNL0_PROT.Description: Control what protocol to use on this port.
SERIALTNL0_PROT.Values: -1:None, 1:MAVLink1, 2:MAVLink2, 3:Frsky D, 4:Frsky SPort, 5:GPS, 7:Alexmos Gimbal Serial, 8:SToRM32 Gimbal Serial, 9:Rangefinder, 10:FrSky SPort Passthrough (OpenTX), 11:Lidar360, 13:Beacon, 14:Volz servo out, 15:SBus servo out, 16:ESC Telemetry, 17:Devo Telemetry, 18:OpticalFlow, 19:RobotisServo

SERIALTNL0_CH_ID.Description: Value of channel_id in the tunnel.Broadcast UAVCAN message.

SERIALTNL1_BAUD.Description: The baud rate used on this port.

SERIALTNL1_PROT.Description: Control what protocol to use on this port.
SERIALTNL1_PROT.Values: -1:None, 1:MAVLink1, 2:MAVLink2, 3:Frsky D, 4:Frsky SPort, 5:GPS, 7:Alexmos Gimbal Serial, 8:SToRM32 Gimbal Serial, 9:Rangefinder, 10:FrSky SPort Passthrough (OpenTX), 11:Lidar360, 13:Beacon, 14:Volz servo out, 15:SBus servo out, 16:ESC Telemetry, 17:Devo Telemetry, 18:OpticalFlow, 19:RobotisServo

SERIALTNL1_CH_ID.Description: Value of channel_id in the tunnel.Broadcast UAVCAN message.

SERIALTNL2_BAUD.Description: The baud rate used on this port.

SERIALTNL2_PROT.Description: Control what protocol to use on this port.
SERIALTNL2_PROT.Values: -1:None, 1:MAVLink1, 2:MAVLink2, 3:Frsky D, 4:Frsky SPort, 5:GPS, 7:Alexmos Gimbal Serial, 8:SToRM32 Gimbal Serial, 9:Rangefinder, 10:FrSky SPort Passthrough (OpenTX), 11:Lidar360, 13:Beacon, 14:Volz servo out, 15:SBus servo out, 16:ESC Telemetry, 17:Devo Telemetry, 18:OpticalFlow, 19:RobotisServo

SERIALTNL2_CH_ID.Description: Value of channel_id in the tunnel.Broadcast UAVCAN message.

MNT_STRM_BM.Description: STorM32: Bitmask to set some functionalities.

MNT_STRM_PTSER.Description: STorM32: Serial used for pass through. -1: Disabled.
